verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> the emissarys <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> that were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the goyim <S%G1484><s%> had <S%G1209><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> <S%G5662><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> was come up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>, they that were of <S%G1537><s%> the b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%> contended <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5710><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Thou wentest in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> men <S%G435><s%> uncircumcised <S%G203><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> didst eat <S%G4906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> with them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> rehearsed the matter from the beginning <S%G756><s%> <S%G5671><s%>, and expounded <S%G1620><s%> <S%G5710><s%> it by order <S%G2517><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>,

I <S%G1473><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> <S%G5713><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of Yafo <S%G2445><s%> davvening <S%G4336><s%> <S%G5740><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a trance <S%G1611><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%>, A certain <S%G5100><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> descend <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, as it had been <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet <S%G3607><s%>, let down <S%G2524><s%> <S%G5746><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G746><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> even <S%G891><s%> to me <S%G1700><s%>:

Upon <S%G1519><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> when I had fastened mine eyes <S%G816><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, I considered <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> fourfooted beasts <S%G5074><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wild beasts <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things <S%G2062><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Not so <S%G3365><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> nothing <S%G3956><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> hath <S%G1525><s%> at any time <S%G3763><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> again <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1208><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath cleansed <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, that call <S%G2840><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> common <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> <S%G1909><s%> three times <S%G5151><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G537><s%> were drawn up <S%G385><s%> <S%G5681><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, immediately <S%G1824><s%> there were <S%G2186><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> already <S%G1824><s%> come <S%G2186><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> <S%G5713><s%>, sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5772><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> bade <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> go with <S%G4905><s%> <S%G5629><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, nothing <S%G3367><s%> doubting <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5734><s%>. Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> accompanied <S%G4862><s%> <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man's <S%G435><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>:

And <S%G5037><s%> he shewed <S%G518><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, which stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5685><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Send <S%G649><s%> <S%G5657><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yafo <S%G2445><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> call for <S%G3343><s%> <S%G5663><s%> SHim`on <S%G4613><s%>, whose surname is <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall tell <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4314><s%> <S%G4571><s%> words <S%G4487><s%>, whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5701><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> remembered I <S%G3415><s%> <S%G5681><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>, how <S%G5613><s%> that he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5701><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

Forasmuch <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the like <S%G2470><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> he did unto us <S%G2254><s%>, who believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>; <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> <S%G5713><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>, that I could <S%G1415><s%> withstand <S%G2967><s%> <S%G5658><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>?

When <S%G1161><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, they held their peace <S%G2270><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5707><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Then <S%G686><s%> hath <S%G1325><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2534><s%> to the goyim <S%G1484><s%> granted <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

Now <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> they which were scattered abroad <S%G1289><s%> <S%G5651><s%> upon <S%G575><s%> the persecution <S%G2347><s%> that arose <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> travelled <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5627><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Phenice <S%G5403><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, preaching <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to none <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> unto the Jews <S%G2453><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2953><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cyrene <S%G2956><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%>, when they were come <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Grecians <S%G1675><s%>, preaching <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> number <S%G706><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, and turned <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> tidings <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things <S%G846><s%> came <S%G191><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they sent forth <S%G1821><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Bar-Nabba <S%G921><s%>, that he should go <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5629><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>.

Who <S%G3739><s%>, when he came <S%G3854><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, was glad <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5644><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> exhorted <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5707><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>, that with purpose <S%G4286><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> they would cleave unto <S%G4357><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> was added <S%G4369><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto the YY <S%G2962><s%>.
Then <S%G1161><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Bar-Nabba <S%G921><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Tarsus <S%G5019><s%>, for to seek <S%G327><s%> <S%G5658><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he brought <S%G71><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that a whole <S%G3650><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> they <S%G846><s%> assembled themselves <S%G4863><s%> <S%G5683><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Congregation <S%G1577><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5658><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%>. And <S%G5037><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> were called <S%G5537><s%> <S%G5658><s%> Messianic <S%G5546><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> came <S%G2718><s%> <S%G5627><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there stood up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus <S%G13><s%>, and signified <S%G4591><s%> <S%G5656><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that there should be <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5721><s%> <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5705><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> dearth <S%G3042><s%> throughout <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%>: which <S%G3748><s%> <S%G2532><s%> came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in the days of <S%G1909><s%> Claudius <S%G2804><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G846><s%> according to <S%G2531><s%> his ability <S%G2141><s%> <S%G5711><s%> <S%G5100><s%>, determined <S%G3724><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5658><s%> relief <S%G1248><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> which dwelt <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>:

Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and sent it <S%G649><s%> <S%G5660><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Bar-Nabba <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%>.
